text: 1:27 Aisaia 1:16-17; 58:6-7; Rom 12:2Guizbangɨn nɨghnɨzir gavgavir God Afeziamɨn damazimɨn deragha osɨmtɨziba puvatɨzim, a kamakɨn: E borir ameboghfeziaba ovengezibar akurvaghɨva, amizir odiarir men paba ovengeziba sarama akurvagh, men osɨmtɨziba ateram. Ezɨ uaghan bizir mam, e uari uan daroriba deravɨra dar ganam, eghtɨ nguazir kamɨn araziba e damutɨ e Godɨn damazimɨn mɨzeghan kogham.
